docs.snippet: Yankees fans in New York and Dodgers fans in Los Angeles face the prospect of another season without being able to see their favorite teams regularly....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yankees fans in New York and Dodgers fans in Los Angeles face the prospect of another season without being able to see their favorite teams regularly.
docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column notes that many Los Angeles Dodgers fans and New York Yankees fans, as baseball season begins, are not able to watch games on television as result of cable broadcast disputes.

headline.main: As Baseball Arrives, There’s No End in Sight to Cable-Channel Conflicts
headline.print_headline: Season’s Start Brings No Relief to Cable Conflicts

docs.snippet: Victims of the attacks on Brussels' airport and subway included students, workers and retirees, commuters heading to work, travelers starting long-anticipated vacations and a homeless man who had taken shelter in the airport. About half were Belgi...
docs.lead_paragraph: Victims of the attacks on Brussels' airport and subway included students, workers and retirees, commuters heading to work, travelers starting long-anticipated vacations and a homeless man who had taken shelter in the airport. About half were Belgian; the rest had come to cosmopolitan, international Brussels from around the world.

headline.main: Brussels Victims Came From Belgium, US and Around the World
headline.print_headline: Brussels Victims Came From Belgium, US and Around the World

docs.snippet: If golf, as in tennis or the Olympics, held more mixed-gender events, “it would be great for the game,” Rory McIlroy said....
docs.lead_paragraph: If golf, as in tennis or the Olympics, held more mixed-gender events, “it would be great for the game,” Rory McIlroy said.
docs.abstract: Karen Crouse On Golf column considers parallel careers of former Junior Ryder Cup teammates Jordan Speith and Lexi Thompson, who are currently world's highest-ranking male and female American golfers, respectively; suggests gender segregation in pro golf shortchanges both game and its fans, and expresses support for combined-gender competitions.

headline.main: Gender Divide in Tournaments Shortchanges Fans and the Sport
headline.print_headline: Gender Divide in Tournaments Shortchanges Fans and the Sport

docs.snippet: Soon after Syracuse or North Carolina — two schools that have been entangled in academic misconduct issues — plays for the national championship, the NCAA Division I council is likely to approve the first changes in 33 years to the way...
docs.lead_paragraph: Soon after Syracuse or North Carolina — two schools that have been entangled in academic misconduct issues — plays for the national championship, the NCAA Division I council is likely to approve the first changes in 33 years to the way the association regulates classroom improprieties.

headline.main: NCAA Trying to Bring Clarity to Academic Misconduct Cases
headline.print_headline: NCAA Trying to Bring Clarity to Academic Misconduct Cases

docs.snippet: Villanova and the N.B.A.’s Sixers represent the highs and lows of basketball in a city known for it....
docs.lead_paragraph: Villanova and the N.B.A.’s Sixers represent the highs and lows of basketball in a city known for it.
docs.abstract: Philadelphia's basketball teams stand to win and lose big in coming weeks; Villanova Wildcats stand just one victory away from their first national championship since 1985 after defeating University of Oklahoma in NCAA national semifinals; conversely, if Philadelphia 76ers, with season record of 9-67, lose their final six games they will tie 1972-73 76ers for worst record in league history.

headline.main: Philadelphia Is in the Final Four ... and in the Cellar
headline.print_headline: Philadelphia in Final Four ... and in the Cellar
